dct_description_sm: by J. Bartholomew, F.R.G.S. ; J. Bartholomew Edinr.
"Missionary Stations are marked with the initials M.S."
British territories colored-in; free states have colored borders.
Shows district and territorial boundaries, railroads, regional and trival names, waterways (including supposed courses).
Railroads present date this map to early 1880s; lack of German presence in Namibia area.
"38," probably taken from Black's General Atlas of the World.
